# Correlate Facebook metrics data

```{r}
matCorr <-
  df1 %>% 
  select(impressions,
         reach,
         clicksAll,
         linkClicks,
         uniqueClicksAll,
         uniqueLinkClicks,
         reactions,
         comments,
         shares) %>% 
  as.matrix %>% 
  cor(use = "pairwise.complete.obs")
matCorr[lower.tri(matCorr)] <- NA
matCorr %>% 
  kable(digits = 2)
```

Check correlation between `impressions` and `reach`.

```{r}
title <- sprintf("Correlation = %.05f", cor(df1[, c("impressions", "reach")])[1, 2])
df1 %>% 
  ggplot +
  aes(x = impressions, y = reach) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 1/2) + 
  geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 1) +
  labs(title = title) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 1/2))
```
